nodes.text: Mamacores were carnivorous creatures from the estuary moon of Trask. One member of this species was held in captivity by Quarren boatmen, who regularly fed the beast. At one point, this mamacore attempted to eat Grogu alive, but was attacked soon after by the Mandalorian warrior Koska Reeves, who saved Grogu.
A mamacore appeared in the Mandalorian Season Two episode "Chapter 11: The Heiress," which was directed by Bryce Dallas Howard, written by Jon Favreau, and first aired on November 13, 2020.
